articles.author: Catherine Nicholls
articles.title: Man arrested in connection with cyberattack that disrupted European airports - CNN
articles.description: A man in his forties has been arrested in connection to a cyber attack that knocked out automatic check-in systems at some of Europe’s busiest airports last week.
articles.content:
A man in his forties has been arrested in connection to a cyber attack that knocked out automatic check-in systems at some of Europes busiest airports last week.
